subject: To Steve
author: Luis
full_text:
Hi , if you read the first page of kit 23 linear sweep , it says :
" Data kit , Op amp function generator ...

A 1 M log potentiometer gives best control over the 6 hz to 6000 hz range covered . ..." 

It means , the minimum frecuencie is 6 hz , value too big for radio i have to use . What is the change if you need frecuencies under the 1 hz .
